original_text: Deacons' wives must live good lives, so that people respect them. They must not say bad things against people. They must think carefully about how they live. People should know that they are honest in everything they do.
korean_text: 여자들도 이와 같이 정숙하고 모함하지 아니하며 절제하며 모든 일에 충성된 자라야 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Deacons' wives must live good lives
sentences.korean_translation: 집사들의 아내들은 선한 삶을 살아야 합니다
그래서 사람들이 그들을 존경하게 해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: They must not say bad things against people
They must think carefully about how they live
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신이 어떻게 사는지 신중히 생각해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: People should know that they are honest
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그들이 정직하다는 것을 알아야 합니다
